subject: Using junit to test an integration
msgSnippet: We write integrations that connect manufacturing systems.  I am currently working on connecting a cad system to a PDM system.  I am trying to determine how I
messageBody:
We write integrations that connect manufacturing
systems. I am currently working on connecting a cad
system to a PDM system. I am trying to determine how
I could use JUnit to test the code we are writing to
facilitate the communication between these two
systems. Both applications require logins. Is there
a way I can launch the JUnit tests from within the
application after I am logged into both?
Alternatively, is there another way to do this? This
is not a web based application.

Thanks,
Jim
